body_html: non-primitive functions can be differentiable as well. they just aren't an atomic differentiable op, but instantiate a whole graph (e.g. CppAD calls primitives "atomic functions"). I'm happy to hear that it's going to be abstract, because I don't think this attribute should have any correspondence to actual AD.

body: non-primitive functions can be differentiable as well. they just aren't an atomic differentiable op, but instantiate a whole graph (e.g. CppAD calls primitives "atomic functions"). I'm happy to hear that it's going to be `abstract`, because I don't think this attribute should have any correspondence to actual AD.
